conversation.content: Studies of the transport of wet water vapour are relevant for various areas of human activity, including the construction and production of building materials, mining, agriculture, environmental safety of technological processes, scientific research. In particular, one of the methods for extracting highly viscous bitumen grades of oil from the subterranean depths is based on the dilution of the contents of the porous medium by means of pumping coolants. The simplest and environmentally friendly coolant is wet steam containing small drops of water. In addition, with the help of heated water vapour, the filtering elements of collectors are cleaned from sediments of the solid phase (for example, paraffins, gas hydrates and ice floes) on the walls of the porous medium. For realistic modeling of the processes of filtration and heat and mass transfer during the injection of wet steam into a porous medium, it is necessary to investigate the characteristics of the interaction of saturated water vapour with individual through-type pores. In this paper, a study was carried out through mathematical modelling of the dependence of the diffusion rate of wet water vapour on the pressure difference outside the pore that occurs when water vapour is injected into a porous medium. The dependencies of the diffusion rate on the pore cross section, the magnitude of vapour adsorption on the pore walls, as well as the effect of water vapour temperature on all these processes were also investigated. Practical interest is the study of the influence of the rate of cooling of water vapour on the diffusion rate and the adsorption of water vapour on the wall of the pores. The calculations were carried out using a hybrid type model that combines molecular dynamics and macro-diffusion approaches to describe the interaction of water vapour with individual pores.

conversation.content: In this paper, we study the landscape of the population negative log-likelihood function of gaussian mixture models with a general number of components. Due to nonconvexity, there exist multiple local minima that are not globally optimal, even when the mixture is well-separated. We show that all local minima share the same form of structure that partially identifies the component centers of the true mixture, in the sense that each local minimum involves a non-overlapping combination of fitting multiple gaussians to a single true component and fitting a single gaussian to multiple true components. Our results apply to the setting where the true mixture components satisfy a certain separation condition, and are valid even when the number of components is over-or under-specified. For gaussian mixtures with three components, we obtain sharper results in terms of the scaling with the separation between the components.

conversation.content:
Mu krop is a dish that originated in Guangdong in Southern China and Hong Kong during the late Qing Dynasty. Chinese citizens from these provinces migrated to settle in many areas of Southeast Asia, and crispy pork, a local signature dish, has therefore spread overseas from the Chinese communities to the new societies, including Thailand.
The Cantonese style crispy pork that was first brought into Thailand and is still served in Chinese restaurants. The original Siu yuk is cooked using the method of marinating Five-spice powder before grilling large pieces of pork belly over high heat for several hours until the pork is cooked throughout. This maintains a thick layer of fat and keeps the rind crispy with a faint scent of spices.
When mu krop was introduced to Thailand during the Ayutthaya period, the cooking method developed slightly differently and the pork belly was baked until it was dry and crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. In this era, crispy pork was considered an interesting menu item and became very popular in the Thai food market. In the present day, crispy pork continues to gain high popularity. This is a result of the delicious characteristic of shiny golden brown, crispy and crunchy rinds with layers of soft, tender and juicy fat and chewy meat, and the aroma from the mixed seasonings. The crispiness comes from the large amount of porosity and complete dryness on the pork belly's surface along with the consistently high heat temperature, which helps air penetrate the skin layer better. However, unlike the Cantonese style crispy pork, mu krop lacks the spice powder in the original recipe. This evolved as Thai restaurants cooked the meat again in hot frying oil for made-to-order restaurants, rendering the prior seasonings useless.

conversation.content: The burial mound at the site has been excavated twice, in 1912 by Clarence Bloomfield Moore and in 1939 by Clarence H. Webb. Between the two excavations, three burial shafts with a total of fourteen burials and more than five hundred grave goods were discovered. The first shaft, found by Moore, was 11 feet (3.4 m) in depth and 13 feet (4.0 m) by 8 feet (2.4 m) in width and height. The other two, found in the 1939 excavations, were 19 feet (5.8 m) by 15 feet (4.6 m) and 12 feet (3.7 m) by 11 feet (3.4 m) in dimensions. The grave goods found during the excavations included intricately flaked flint knives, known since as Gahagan blades, a matched pair of long-nosed god maskette earrings made of sheet copper, Missouri flint clay statues and pipes, copper ear ornaments, embossed copper plates, greenstone celts and spuds, and caches of beads and arrow heads. Many of the grave goods were exotic imports from such distant places as the Gulf Coast, the Central Texas plateau, Tennessee, Kentucky, and the Great Lakes, and may be indicative of involvement in continent wide trade and religious networks such as the Southeastern Ceremonial Complex. Many of the disinterred remains and grave goods were donated to Louisiana State University Museum of Natural Science by the Peabody Museum of Archaeology and Ethnology at Harvard University, and few more later by Dr. Webb.

conversation.content:
Environmental sustainability, a pressing concern in today's world, hinges on two critical factors: the harmonization of renewable resource harvesting with their regeneration rates and the offsetting of non-renewable resource depletion with the growth of renewable alternatives. The escalating use of natural resources has made it imperative to implement measures that ensure the preservation of these resources for posterity, mitigate economic activities that harm the environment, and foster businesses that prioritize carbon reduction. At its core, sustainable development is committed to availing affordable and clean energy to all.

The trajectory of modern industrialization and economic growth has led to significant environmental degradation and adverse climate changes. Pollution from industries and the use of harmful agricultural substances have exerted immense pressure on ecosystems. In response, various initiatives have been undertaken to attain sustainability, such as the elimination of detrimental agricultural practices and the implementation of rainwater harvesting systems.

Manufacturing processes, in particular, have a profound impact on the environment. They alter atmospheric conditions and have consequential effects on agriculture. For instance, the papermaking industry, heavily reliant on trees, has contributed to widespread deforestation, leading to an increase in atmospheric carbon dioxide levels. While efforts are made to replant trees, these often fall short, further compounding environmental and climatic challenges.

To address these issues, a multifaceted approach is required. This includes stringent regulations on industrial pollution, promotion of sustainable agricultural practices, and investment in renewable energy sources. Moreover, businesses must adopt models that emphasize carbon neutrality and resource efficiency. By integrating these measures, we can strive towards a future where economic growth and environmental sustainability are not mutually exclusive, but rather, interdependent goals. This balanced approach will ensure that we meet the needs of the present without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.

conversation.content:
好奇心是推动人类社会不断探索和进步的永动机。如同黑暗中的星星之火，它点燃人们心中对未知的渴望，驱使我们迈出探索的步伐。

古往今来，无数事例证明了好奇心的力量。正是对未知星海的好奇，促使人类发明了天文望远镜，并最终将脚步踏上了月球；也正是对微观世界的迷恋，让人类打开了原子的大门，揭示了物质构成的奥秘。从钻木取火到互联网时代，每一次科技的飞跃，都离不开好奇心作为原始的推动力。

好奇心不仅驱动着个体的学习和成长，也推动着整个社会的进步。它促使人们不断提出问题，寻求答案，挑战现有认知，从而创造出新的知识、新的技术、新的文化。正是在这种不断探索的过程中，人类文明才能不断向前发展，创造更加美好的未来。

conversation.content: In the last decade, the use of simple rating and comparison surveys has proliferated on social and digital media platforms to fuel recommendations. These simple surveys and their extrapolation with machine learning algorithms shed light on user preferences over large and growing pools of items, such as movies, songs and ads. Social scientists have a long history of measuring perceptions, preferences and opinions, often over smaller, discrete item sets with exhaustive rating or ranking surveys. This paper introduces simple surveys for social science application. We ran experiments to compare the predictive accuracy of both individual and aggregate comparative assessments using four types of simple surveys: pairwise comparisons and ratings on 2, 5 and continuous point scales in three distinct contexts: perceived Safety of Google Streetview Images, Likeability of Artwork, and Hilarity of Animal GIFs. Across contexts, we find that continuous scale ratings best predict individual assessments but consume the most time and cognitive effort. Binary choice surveys are quick and perform best to predict aggregate assessments, useful for collective decision tasks, but poorly predict personalized preferences, for which they are currently used by Netflix to recommend movies. Pairwise comparisons, by contrast, perform well to predict personal assessments, but poorly predict aggregate assessments despite being widely used to crowdsource ideas and collective preferences. We demonstrate how findings from these surveys can be visualized in a low-dimensional space that reveals distinct respondent interpretations of questions asked in each context. We conclude by reflecting on differences between sparse, incomplete simple surveys and their traditional survey counterparts in terms of efficiency, information elicited and settings in which knowing less about more may be critical for social science.

conversation.content: 孝道在中华文化中占据着至高无上的地位，是维系人际关系和社会治理的基石。古圣先贤们正是通过孝道，培养人们对父母的敬畏和亲近之情，以润物细无声的方式教化众人，使得社会能够和平稳定地发展，无需依赖严厉的刑罚和压制手段。孝道不仅是家庭伦理的核心，也是君臣关系和国家治理的重要原则。君主若顺遂天性，尊敬和孝顺父母，无疑会成为典范，引导人民效法，从而实现社会的和谐共处。然而，若君主违背天性，不尊重父母，不仅失德，更会使国家陷入动荡和灾难之中。因此，君子之道在于以身作则，其言行必须符合道德礼法，树立良好的榜样，使百姓对其心存敬畏与爱戴。通过君子的正言正行，社会的道德风尚得以倡导和传播，政策也能顺畅地推行。孝道如同润滑剂，使得社会机制运转平稳，人与人之间的关系和谐美好。这不仅仅是家庭的幸福，也是国家的安定之本。因此，孝道的弘扬具有跨越时空的永恒价值，为个人、家庭和国家提供了坚实的伦理基础。

conversation.content: So a child is naturally disposed to kindly feeling because he sees that every one about him is inclined to help him, and from this experience he gets the habit of a kindly feeling towards his species; but with the expansion of his relations, his needs, his dependence, active or passive, the consciousness of his relations to others is awakened, and leads to the sense of duties and preferences. Then the child becomes masterful, jealous, deceitful, and vindictive. If he is not compelled to obedience, when he does not see the usefulness of what he is told to do, he attributes it to caprice, to an intention of tormenting him, and he rebels. If people give in to him, as soon as anything opposes him he regards it as rebellion, as a determination to resist him; he beats the chair or table for disobeying him. Self-love, which concerns itself only with ourselves, is content to satisfy our own needs; but selfishness, which is always comparing self with others, is never satisfied and never can be; for this feeling, which prefers ourselves to others, requires that they should prefer us to themselves, which is impossible. Thus the tender and gentle passions spring from self-love, while the hateful and angry passions spring from selfishness. So it is the fewness of his needs, the narrow limits within which he can compare himself with others, that makes a man really good; what makes him really bad is a multiplicity of needs and dependence on the opinions of others. It is easy to see how we can apply this principle and guide every passion of children and men towards good or evil. True, man cannot always live alone, and it will be hard therefore to remain good; and this difficulty will increase of necessity as his relations with others are extended. For this reason, above all, the dangers of social life demand that the necessary skill and care shall be devoted to guarding the human heart against the depravity which springs from fresh needs.

conversation.content:
The 1950s marked a turning point in the fight against depression.  While searching for treatments for entirely different conditions, scientists stumbled upon two groundbreaking drugs. Iproniazid, initially used to combat tuberculosis, and imipramine, intended to alleviate allergies, both unexpectedly lifted the spirits of depressed patients. This surprising outcome sparked a revolution in our understanding of depression, leading to the development of the chemical imbalance theory. This theory proposed that depression stemmed from a deficiency of certain neurotransmitters, known as monoamines, in the brain.

Early antidepressants, developed based on this theory, targeted multiple monoamines simultaneously. While somewhat effective, these medications often came with a range of undesirable side effects.  However, research continued, and in the 1970s, scientists made another crucial discovery: the most effective antidepressants specifically targeted serotonin, a particular type of monoamine. This breakthrough paved the way for a new generation of antidepressants, culminating in the development of Prozac in 1988, a drug that revolutionized depression treatment and continues to impact millions of lives today.

conversation.content:
In a case that could reshape the landscape of U.S. futures markets, the Supreme Court is poised to interpret a single word in a 1974 amendment to the Commodity Exchange Act. The outcome of this interpretation may have far-reaching consequences for financial institutions, futures exchanges, and regulatory oversight in the country.

The amendment in question, suggested by the Treasury Department nearly five decades ago, exempts certain foreign currency transactions from Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) regulations unless they are conducted "on a board of trade." However, the precise meaning of the word "in" within this context has become a subject of intense legal scrutiny and debate.

Futures exchanges are expressing concern that a broad interpretation of the exemption could significantly harm their business model. They argue that such a reading might allow banks to conduct transactions that would typically fall under CFTC oversight without proper regulation, potentially creating an uneven playing field in the market.

On the other hand, banks and other financial institutions are worried about the implications of a narrow interpretation. They fear that a restrictive reading of the exemption could force them to move their operations overseas to avoid burdensome regulations, potentially leading to a loss of business and jobs in the United States.

The case that has brought this issue to the forefront involves hedge fund manager William Dunn. The Supreme Court is expected to resolve conflicting lower court rulings on whether the exemption applies solely to actual currency dealings or if it also encompasses derivatives such as futures and options.

Legal experts suggest that the Court's decision could have a profound impact on the $5.3 trillion-a-day global foreign exchange market, as well as the multi-trillion-dollar derivatives market. The ruling may determine which transactions fall under CFTC jurisdiction and which remain exempt, potentially altering the regulatory landscape for a significant portion of the financial industry.

As the financial community anxiously awaits the Supreme Court's decision, there is growing anticipation that Congressional action may be necessary to address the issue definitively. Lawmakers are expected to closely monitor the outcome of the case and potentially draft new legislation to clarify the scope of the exemption and its application to various financial instruments.

The case highlights the challenges of applying decades-old legislation to rapidly evolving financial markets and instruments. It also underscores the delicate balance between fostering innovation and ensuring adequate regulatory oversight in the financial sector.

As the Supreme Court deliberates on this crucial interpretation, market participants, regulators, and policymakers alike are bracing for potential shifts in the regulatory framework that governs a significant portion of the U.S. financial system. The outcome of this case may well shape the future of futures markets and currency trading in the United States for years to come.

conversation.content:
St. Sophia Orthodox Cathedral in Harbin stands as a testament to the city's rich historical and cultural heritage. Originally erected in 1907 from timber, the cathedral served as a beacon of hope for Russian troops demoralized after the Russo-Japanese War, offering them spiritual solace and a connection to their homeland. With the growth of Harbin's population, which included a thriving Russian community, the need for a more substantial and enduring place of worship became evident.

Consequently, a grand renovation project was embarked upon, commencing on September 23, 1923, and meticulously carried out over a period of nine years. The ambitious construction work reached its completion on November 25, 1932, revealing a transformed cathedral that would come to symbolize the pinnacle of Orthodox architecture in the Far East. This new St. Sophia Cathedral boasted not only an enlarged physical presence but also intricate designs and ornate decorations that echoed the grandeur of ancient Byzantine styles, making it a landmark of architectural significance and a proud representation of the Orthodox faith in the region.

As the largest Orthodox establishment in the Far East, the cathedral not only served the religious needs of the local Russian populace but also functioned as a communal hub, fostering cultural exchange and community bonding among the diverse inhabitants of Harbin. Today, St. Sophia Cathedral stands as a preserved monument, a window into Harbin's past, and a living reminder of the historical ties between China and Russia. Its majestic dome, towering above the cityscape, continues to captivate visitors with its awe-inspiring beauty and enduring historical narrative.

In this world of scent and smell, the young elephant finds her place, her identity woven into the fabric of her herd, each breath a reminder of her connection to the land, to her family, and to the ancient traditions that guide her path. conversation.content: Objective: Numerous glucose prediction algorithm have been proposed to empower type 1 diabetes (T1D) management. Most of these algorithms only account for input such as glucose, insulin and carbohydrate, which limits their performance. Here, we present a novel glucose prediction algorithm which, in addition to standard inputs, accounts for meal absorption and physical exercise information to enhance prediction accuracy. Methods: a compartmental model of glucose-insulin dynamics combined with a deconvolution technique for state estimation is employed for glucose prediction. In silico data corresponding from the 10 adult subjects of UVa-Padova simulator, and clinical data from 10 adults with T1D were used. Finally, a comparison against a validated glucose prediction algorithm based on a latent variable with exogenous input (LVX) model is provided. Results: For a prediction horizon of 60 minutes, accounting for meal absorption and physical exercise improved glucose forecasting accuracy. In particular, root mean square error (mg/dL) went from 26.68 to 23.89, p<0.001 (in silico data); and from 37.02 to 35.96, p<0.001 (clinical data - only meal information). Such improvement in accuracy was translated into significant improvements on hypoglycaemia and hyperglycaemia prediction. Finally, the performance of the proposed algorithm is statistically superior to that of the LVX algorithm (26.68 vs. 32.80, p<0.001 (in silico data); 37.02 vs. 49.17, p<0.01 (clinical data). Conclusion: Taking into account meal absorption and physical exercise information improves glucose prediction accuracy.

conversation.content:
The crimson curtains drew back to reveal a scene of calculated mischief and social maneuvering, as Merecraft introduced his grand plot to deceive Fitzdottrel with the fictional dukedom of Drownedland. Despite the absurdity of granting a title to a submerged, non-existent territory, the promise of nobility danced in Fitzdottrel’s eyes, though oddly, this plot was but a minor ripple in the larger current of events.

Fitzdottrel’s true intentions emerged as he wielded the office of the Master of Dependencies, an obscure bureaucratic position, to ignite a quarrel with Wittipol. This deliberate confrontation, rife with prate and bluster, set into motion a significant shift in fortune. Not long after, the estate that Fitzdottrel cherished fell into the hands of the virtuous Manly, who, in an act of magnanimity and perhaps pity, restored it to Mrs. Fitzdottrel. Her silent resilience and wisdom had not gone unnoticed, and this unexpected turn provided a rare moment of justice in a world otherwise ruled by folly.

The fourth act, a masquerade of wit and societal parody, took a vibrant turn as Wittipol, ever the resourceful schemer, donned the elaborate disguise of a Spanish lady. Giggles and gasps rippled through the audience as he mimicked the affectations of foreign nobility, strutting and preening with exaggerated elegance. His performance not only mocked the absurdities of imported fashions but also held a mirror to the frivolous nature of high society. The satire was sharp but laced with humor, making the audience laugh at their own pretensions and vanities.

As the play progressed into the fifth act, Jonson’s quill turned towards a darker, yet equally ludicrous, subject—demoniacs. The characters, bedecked in grotesque paraphernalia, embodied the superstitions and fears of the age, offering a scathing parody of those who claimed to be possessed or in communion with dark forces. This act, a fitting appendix to the devil-plot, wrapped up the narrative threads with a flourish, leaving no doubt of Jonson’s critical stance on the societal abuses he portrayed.

By its end, the play stood as a testament to Jonson's genius—an intricate tapestry of character-driven drama, meticulous plot development, and biting comedy. The ethical depth of the main themes resonated beyond the laughter and absurdity, providing a thought-provoking critique of the human condition and societal flaws. With every scene, Jonson held a mirror to his audience, compelling them to reflect on their own foibles while entertaining them with his masterful blend of satire and storytelling.

conversation.content:
Hurricane Estelle was a significant tropical weather event that occurred in July 1986, distinguished for its status as the sixth tropical cyclone, fifth named storm, third hurricane, and first major hurricane within the notably active 1986 Pacific hurricane season. The system originated from a tropical depression which formed on July 16, situated southwest of Baja California, Mexico. Rapid intensification ensued, with the system quickly escalating into a tropical storm and subsequently achieving hurricane status by July 18.

Estelle reached its peak as a formidable Category 4 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Wind Scale. However, this intensity was short-lived as the hurricane began to weaken while drawing closer to the Hawaiian Islands. By July 24, Estelle had diminished to a tropical storm, and ultimately dissipated entirely by July 26 without making direct landfall.

In anticipation of the storm’s potential impact, authorities in Hawaii issued a hurricane watch, which resulted in the precautionary evacuation of approximately 200 residents. Despite the threat, Hurricane Estelle’s effects on the islands were relatively mild, confined primarily to coastal areas where it generated high waves responsible for two fatalities and an estimated $2 million in damages. As the remnants of Estelle continued eastward, they brought light to moderate showers to parts of the region but did not inflict any further significant harm.

conversation.content:
Clear Blue in Stormy Skies is the sixth studio album by New Zealand singer Jenny Morris. It was released 24 June 2006, by Liberation Blue Records. It is a collection of Morris' remodelled radio hits of the 1980s and 1990s, including a retake of "You I Know", rewritten by its original songwriter, Neil Finn, an instrumental arrangement of her most requested song, "Little Little", and a cover of INXS' song, "This Time", in tribute to her friend Michael Hutchence. The one new song, "This Time", contains the album's title as a lyric.
Clear Blue in Stormy Skies was recorded in February 2006 with members of her backing band, Steve Balbi (Noiseworks, Electric Hippies) who co-produced; Paul Searles (Skunkhour) and Josh Quong Tart.
Morris' vocals were recorded on a vintage valve microphone once used by Frank Sinatra.
We also used a lot of this old spring reverb. It crapped out a lot and it was very frustrating, but man, when it worked it was amazing and I think that's why this album has got that special earthiness about it.
— Jenny Morris

conversation.content:
My fascination with police work started young. I devoured cop shows, dreamt of sirens and flashing lights, and even convinced my local precinct to let me tag along on a few ride-alongs. It was exhilarating, eye-opening, and sometimes, utterly heartbreaking. You see, through those ride-alongs, I witnessed firsthand the vast spectrum of human experiences that elicit a call to 9-1-1. And while some calls were genuinely life-or-death situations, others were far more nuanced.

I saw how a simple misunderstanding between neighbors could escalate into a shouting match, culminating in a frantic 9-1-1 call. I watched as individuals grappling with mental health crises, unable to articulate their distress, found themselves face-to-face with armed officers instead of compassionate caregivers. These encounters, while seemingly benign, often spiraled, sometimes ending in arrests, hefty fines, or tragically, even loss of life.

Now, let me be clear: I'm not advocating for the abolishment of the police force. What I am proposing is a paradigm shift, a reimagining of how we respond to certain emergencies. A system where trained mental health professionals are dispatched alongside, or even instead of, law enforcement officers when situations involve mental health crises.

This idea isn't some utopian fantasy; it's a reality in Eugene, Oregon. There, a program called CAHOOTS has been operating for over three decades, dispatching teams of mental health professionals and EMTs to handle non-violent, mental health-related 9-1-1 calls. The results speak for themselves: reduced police involvement, fewer arrests, and a more humane approach to addressing mental health crises.

This model, my friends, is not about demonizing law enforcement. It's about acknowledging the limitations of a one-size-fits-all approach to emergencies. It's about recognizing that sometimes, a compassionate ear, a calming presence, and the expertise of a mental health professional are far more effective than flashing lights and a badge. It's about creating a system that protects and serves all its citizens, ensuring that a cry for help doesn't inadvertently become a pathway to further harm.

conversation.content:
在哲学的视角下，君子和小人的行为与心态差异展现了人类的两种截然不同的价值取向。作为道德的楷模，君子永远以他人的善行为榜样，时刻反省自己的错误，并尊重能够指出自己错误的人。这是因为君子深知，只有通过自我反省和虚心接受他人批评，才能不断完善自己，成长为更好的人。

和君子形成鲜明对比的是小人。小人往往厌恶批评，倾向于追求虚假的赞美。他们不仅不愿接受他人劝谏，反而会将其视为对自己的威胁。这种自我膨胀的心态使他们行为伪善，亲近拍马屁的人，而疏远忠诚直言者。这种行为方式，最终将导致他们自身的灭亡。因为在追求虚假的赞美过程中，他们渐渐失去真实的自我，内心空虚而没有立足之地。

诗经中有一句至理名言，小人喜爱谄媚而违背美好的建议，听从坏主意。这句话深刻揭露了小人的悲哀。他们无法接受批评和劝谏，反而倾向于那些阿谀奉承的言语和有害的建议。这种行为方式不仅危害他人，也最终将导致他们自身的毁灭。

在这里，我们需要强调的是，君子和小人的行为与心态差异，反映了两种不同的价值观念。君子以善行为根本，追求美德和真理。他们通过自我反省和接受他人批评，不断完善自己。相反，小人注重虚假的赞美和自我膨胀，最终导致自己的灭亡。因此，作为一个有理想、有追求的人，我们应该学习君子的美德，践行善行，追求真理。

conversation.content:
## 经济学

**经济学**是一门研究人类如何在资源稀缺的情况下进行生产、分配、交换和消费的社会科学。它分析个人、企业、政府和其他机构如何做出选择来满足其需求和愿望。

经济学的应用范围十分广泛，涵盖了商业、金融、政府等多个领域，并扩展到健康、犯罪、教育、法律、政治、社会架构、宗教、战争和科学等方面。

对于经济学的定义，不同学者持有不同观点：

* **亚当·斯密**，被誉为“现代经济学之父”，在其著作《国富论》中将经济学定义为“研究国民财富的性质和原因的学问”。
* **让-巴蒂斯特·赛伊**将经济学定义为“财富生产、分配和消费的学问”。
* **托马斯·卡莱尔**则讽刺地称经济学为“忧郁的科学”，这个词最早由**托马斯·罗伯特·马尔萨斯**在其著作中提出，用来描述经济学对人口增长和资源稀缺等问题的悲观看法。

在21世纪初，经济学在社会科学中的影响力不断增加，其研究方法和分析框架被广泛应用于其他社会科学领域，这种现象被一些学者讽刺为“经济学帝国主义”。 

尽管经济学对人类社会发展具有重要意义，但它也面临着一些批评和挑战，例如对经济模型的过度依赖、对社会和环境因素的忽视等。

conversation.content:
在古代社会的伦理与礼制探讨中，厚葬久丧这一习俗常常成为哲学辩论的核心议题。这一习俗，一方面体现了人们对逝者的尊重与哀悼之情，另一方面，其对社会资源的占用及对生者生活的影响，引发了深刻的道德与实践考量。两种截然相反的观点围绕此习俗展开了激烈的交锋，一方主张其为维护礼教、彰显孝道之必要，而另一方则忧虑其可能引发的社会不公与经济负担。

首先，让我们审视支持厚葬久丧的传统观念。在这一视角下，仪式的隆重与否被视为衡量孝心深浅的标尺，认为通过厚葬久丧，可以展现家族对先人的深切怀念与敬仰。持此论者相信，这样的实践不仅巩固了家族内部的情感纽带，也间接促进了社会的稳定和谐，因为孝道被视为维持社会秩序的根本。他们认为，当每个人都尽力履行对逝者的义务时，社会将自然趋向于仁爱与和谐。

然而，另一派观点则从现实效益的角度出发，提出了质疑。他们指出，在资源有限的社会里，过度投入于丧葬仪式，可能导致贫富差距加剧——富贵之家或许能承担起高昂的丧葬费用而不伤元气，而贫穷之家却可能因此陷入更深的困境。此外，长时间的守丧不仅影响个体的生产劳动，也可能拖延国家的发展进程，尤其是在动荡或灾荒时期，这样的习俗无异于雪上加霜。如此看来，厚葬久丧非但未能实现仁义，反而成为了社会不平等与混乱的根源。

那么，如何评判这两种立场的正确性？哲学的智慧在于寻求平衡与中庸之道。我们应以“是否有利于天下之利”作为判断标准，这需要深入考察厚葬久丧的实际效果。如果这种习俗确实能够促进社会的整体福祉，比如增强社群凝聚力，且不会给国家和百姓带来过度负担，那么它便可以被视为仁义之举，值得鼓励与延续。反之，若其负面影响显著，如加剧社会矛盾与经济压力，则必须视为不仁不义，应通过合理的政策引导加以调整或限制。

最终结论是，施政者在制定相关政策时，应以全面考量社会利益为前提，避免偏颇于某一特定阶层的利益诉求，确保政策既能体现对传统的尊重，又不失时代的进步性。唯有当我们的行为既遵循了道德的指引，又能切实促进公共福祉，才是真正实现了仁义的实践。在厚葬久丧这一古老习俗的现代审视中，我们再次见证了哲学思考对于指导社会实践的重要性，以及在传统与现代、情感与理性之间寻求平衡的永恒课题。

conversation.content: In the 1950s, the discovery of two new drugs sparked what would become a multibillion dollar market for antidepressants. Neither drug was intended to treat depression at all— in fact, at the time, many doctors and scientists believed psychotherapy was the only approach to treating depression. The decades-long journey of discovery that followed revolutionized our understanding of depression— and raised questions we hadn’t considered before.One of those first two antidepressant drugs was ipronaizid, which was intended to treat tuberculosis. In a 1952 trial, it not only treated tuberculosis, it also improved the moods of patients who had previously been diagnosed with depression. In 1956, a Swiss clinician observed a similar effect when running a trial for imipramine, a drug for allergic reactions. Both drugs affected a class of neurotransmitters called monoamines.The discovery of these antidepressant drugs gave rise to the chemical imbalance theory, the idea that depression is caused by having insufficient monoamines in the brain’s synapses. Ipronaizid, imipramine, and other drugs like them were thought to restore that balance by increasing the availability of monoamines in the brain.These drugs targeted several different monoamines, each of which acted on a wide range of receptors in the brain. This often meant a lot of side effects, including headaches, grogginess, and cognitive impairments including difficulty with memory, thinking, and judgment.Hoping to make the drugs more targeted and reduce side effects, scientists began studying existing antidepressants to figure out which specific monoamines were most associated with improvements in depression. In the 1970s, several different researchers converged on an answer: the most effective antidepressants all seemed to act on one monoamine called serotonin.This discovery led to the production of fluoxetine, or Prozac, in 1988.

conversation.content:
In the realm of epistemology, the nature of a priori knowledge has long been a subject of philosophical inquiry. Prior to Kant's revolutionary insights, the prevailing wisdom held that all a priori knowledge was inherently analytic in nature. This perspective posited that such knowledge consisted solely of propositions wherein the predicate was merely a component of the subject, exemplified by statements like "A bald man is a man." These analytic judgments, while logically incontrovertible, were often deemed trivial and seldom explicitly articulated outside of rhetorical contexts.

The presumption that all a priori knowledge adhered to this pattern led to a narrowly defined epistemological landscape. It suggested that any attempt to deny such knowledge would inevitably result in logical contradiction, thereby reinforcing its perceived infallibility. This view, however, imposed significant limitations on our understanding of the potential scope and depth of a priori knowledge.

Kant's critical philosophy would later challenge this entrenched notion, introducing the concept of synthetic a priori knowledge. This paradigm shift opened new avenues for exploring the foundations of human understanding, expanding our conception of what can be known independently of experience while still contributing meaningful content to our knowledge. The implications of this intellectual revolution continue to resonate throughout contemporary philosophical discourse, inviting us to reconsider the very nature of knowledge itself.

conversation.content: A Rose for Emily is an excellent example of the Southern Gothic genre. The Southern Gothic is a literal tradition that came into existence in the 20 th century and became popular in European literature. The genre is rooted in mysterious secrets, supernatural events, frightening scenarios, and extreme character duress, which leaves the reader desensitized. The genre focuses on ridiculous and morbid features such as secret passages, draft castles, and laced cobwebs. The Southern Gothic genre explores the antisocial behaviors that confined against the social norms and hinged on the belief that daily life and these social customs were just imaginary. A Rose For Emily creates the theme of mental illness, murders, love-loss that ends up creating a frightening environment for the client, thus suits a Gothic Tale.

conversation.content: This paper provides an in-depth examination of the population negative log-likelihood function of Gaussian Mixture Models (GMMs), extending to scenarios with any number of components. The inherent nonconvexity of the problem introduces multiple local minima that are not globally optimal, a challenge that persists even in well-separated mixtures. Notably, the analysis reveals that each local minimum adheres to a specific structure that offers partial identification of the true components. This can manifest in two ways: either multiple Gaussian distributions are fitted to a single component, or a single Gaussian distribution is fitted to multiple components. The applicability of these findings hinges on the true components satisfying a separation criterion and is robust across both over-specified and under-specified component numbers. The study further refines these insights for GMMs with three components by establishing more precise scaling in relation to component separation, thereby enhancing our understanding of GMM behavior.

conversation.content: Selfish routing of autonomous vehicles (AVs) can lead to system-wide inefficiencies, degrading traffic conditions. This paper proposes a novel joint routing and pricing control scheme to mitigate this problem. We introduce a bi-level optimization framework that incentivizes AVs to adopt system optimal (SO) routing behavior. The upper level dynamically optimizes tolls, offering lower rates for SO routes, while the lower level employs a mixed equilibrium dynamic traffic assignment model. This model considers both AVs and human-driven vehicles (HVs), capturing the interplay between their routing decisions. By imposing congestion charges on user equilibrium (UE) seeking AVs and HVs, our scheme encourages a shift towards SO routing, ultimately improving overall traffic efficiency in mixed autonomy networks.

conversation.content:
In a move that could send significant ripples through the U.S. futures markets, the Supreme Court is set to interpret a seemingly innocuous word, 'in,' from a 1974 amendment to the Commodity Exchange Act. This amendment, introduced at the suggestion of the Treasury Department, exempts certain foreign currency transactions from the regulatory purview of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC), but only if they are not conducted 'on a board of trade.'

The ambiguity of the preposition 'in' has sparked legal disputes, with different interpretations leading to divergent lower court rulings. The case before the Supreme Court, involving hedge fund manager William Dunn, seeks to resolve this conflict. The crux of the matter is whether the exemption applies solely to actual currency dealings or if it also encompasses derivatives such as futures and options.

Futures exchanges are closely watching the case, fearing that a broad interpretation of 'in' could subject a wider range of transactions to CFTC regulations, potentially harming their business. Conversely, banks are concerned that a narrow interpretation could drive more operations abroad to avoid stringent regulations, echoing a trend seen in other financial sectors in recent years.

The potential implications of the Supreme Court's decision have not gone unnoticed in Congress. Legislators are expected to take action to address the issue, although the exact nature of their intervention remains unclear. The forthcoming ruling could provide much-needed clarity on the reach of CFTC regulations, shaping the future of the U.S. futures markets and the broader financial landscape.

As the Supreme Court prepares to weigh in, industry players and lawmakers alike are holding their breath, awaiting a decision that could redefine the boundaries of regulatory oversight in the complex world of commodity exchange. The outcome promises to have far-reaching consequences, influencing everything from the day-to-day operations of financial institutions to the broader economic policies governing the multi-trillion-dollar futures market.

conversation.content: 文学作品的伦理性质决定了不同批评方法的运用。然而，在实际的文学研究和批评中，往往会将所有文学作品都混同地视为具有伦理内容，这不仅会导致分析的偏差，也会对作品的精神实质造成误解。伦理文学作品的核心在于探索人类的价值观念和人与人之间的关系，这些作品往往通过对人性的深入剖析和道德问题的探讨来进行伦理批判。相反，非伦理文学则更侧重于对于自然界和自我的探索，这些作品往往以对自然和自我的认知和感受为主，缺乏伦理性质的内涵。区分伦理和非伦理文学对于避免分析方法的混淆具有重要意义，不应将非伦理内容的作品强行套入伦理批评的框架中。正确的分类有助于我们更准确地理解和评估文学作品，同时也促进了文学研究和创作的深化和丰富。这一区分将使我们能够更好地评估文学作品的伦理含义和社会意义，进而促进文学研究和创作的发展。

conversation.content:
## The Influence of Wet Water Vapour Diffusion on Heavy Oil Viscosity Reduction and Porous Media Applications

The efficient transport of wet water vapour plays a crucial role in diverse sectors, including construction, mining, agriculture, and environmental safety. This study delves into the specific application of wet steam for reducing the viscosity of heavy oil and cleaning filtering elements in porous media. Heavy oil, characterized by its high viscosity, poses significant challenges in extraction and transportation. This research explores the use of wet steam injection as an innovative technique for viscosity reduction, facilitating more efficient oil recovery.

A comprehensive mathematical model forms the cornerstone of this investigation. This model describes the intricate diffusion process of wet water vapour through porous media, considering critical factors such as pressure difference, pore cross-section geometry, vapour adsorption onto pore walls, and temperature variations. The model delves into the complex interplay of these factors and their influence on the overall diffusion rate. 

A key aspect of this study focuses on the cooling effect of water vapour and its implications for both diffusion and adsorption. The condensation of water vapour within the porous medium leads to a reduction in temperature, directly impacting the viscosity of the heavy oil and the adsorption characteristics of the vapour. This dynamic interplay between heat and mass transfer is addressed through a hybrid modeling approach, combining the insights of molecular dynamics simulations with macroscopic diffusion models.

Molecular dynamics simulations provide a detailed understanding of the interactions between water molecules and the porous medium at the molecular level. These simulations elucidate the adsorption mechanisms and their dependence on temperature and pressure. This molecular-level information is then integrated into a macroscopic diffusion model, enabling the prediction of water vapour transport and its influence on the overall system behavior. This hybrid approach allows for a comprehensive analysis of the complex phenomena associated with wet water vapour diffusion in porous media, providing valuable insights for optimizing heavy oil extraction and enhancing the efficiency of filtration processes.

尊敬的各位，今天我站在这里，是要和大家分享一段非典型的人生旅程。在我16岁的青涩年纪，一次意外的契机将我推入了光鲜亮丽却又陌生的模特世界。这并非我的主动选择，而是源于母亲的鼓励与一份报名表——世界精英模特大赛。在她的坚定支持下，我踏上了这个舞台，并不可思议地跻身全球前十名。

然而，荣耀背后，是我不为人知的真实感受。面对镜头，我被要求展现出冷漠的距离美，每一次“不许笑”的指令都让我内心挣扎。我来自一个对时尚懵懂无知的背景，那些设计前卫、在他人眼中或许是艺术品的服装，在我看来却是那样古怪与不自在。我承认，我在幕后抱怨过，疑惑过，这份工作并不像外界所见那般光鲜。

但正是这段经历，教会了我勇敢与真实。它让我意识到，成功不仅仅是站在聚光灯下接受掌声，更是忠于自我，寻找让自己真正快乐与激情所在的勇气。或许我不是天生的模特，但我学会了欣赏每一种艺术的形式，即便是以一种最不寻常的方式进入我的生活。

所以，今天我分享的不仅仅是一个关于模特的故事，而是一次探索自我、理解多样性的旅程。让我们鼓起勇气，拥抱那些让生命变得更加丰富多彩的不同体验，即使它们最初可能并不符合我们的设想。谢谢大家。

conversation.content:
Online reviews have become indispensable for consumer decision-making, providing valuable insights into product quality and vendor reputation. However, the increasing prevalence of professional spammers injecting deceptive reviews poses a significant threat to the reliability of online review systems. These sophisticated spammers employ rapidly evolving strategies, making detection a challenging task. Existing review spam detection approaches primarily focus on maximizing accuracy, which, while important, does not guarantee trustworthiness or robustness against diverse spamming tactics. 

This paper proposes a novel minimax game framework for online review spam detection that goes beyond accuracy. We model the interaction between spammers and detectors as a dynamic game, where each player optimizes for their practical objectives. Spammers aim to maximize their impact on consumer perception, while detectors strive to ensure the trustworthiness of the review system. Through an equilibrium analysis of this game, we derive stable detection strategies that are robust against a wide range of spamming behaviors.

在苍茫的北地，随着匈奴部落的西迁与南移，历史的尘埃中升起了一股新兴力量——拓跋氏，鲜卑族的勇士们踏上了昔日匈奴的广袤土地。他们与残存的匈奴部族结成了牢不可破的联盟，共同抵御着周边部落的侵扰。铁蹄之下，一个个强敌纷纷陨落，最终，在公元四世纪末的曙光中，他们在今天的大同，那片古老而肥沃的土地上，建立起了一座新的国度。

在这片充满希望的新天地里，北魏的创立者并没有忘记吸取历史的智慧。汉族士人的声音在朝堂回响，他们以博大的学问和深邃的见解，提议将国号更易为“魏”，寓意着继承中原文化的辉煌，也标志着一个新时代的开启。北魏，这个融合了草原剽悍与中原文明之名，就此载入史册。

随后的半个世纪，是北魏不断扩张的辉煌时期。它的军队如同一股不可阻挡的洪流，沿着黄河的脉络，席卷四方，将分散的部落与小国逐一并吞。这不仅是一场军事征服，更是一次深远的文化交融与治理模式的革新。在无数次烽火与谈判之后，北魏终于完成了对黄河流域的统一大业，为这片古老大地带来了一个相对和平与繁荣的时代。

北魏的崛起，不仅是武力的胜利，更是智慧与包容的见证。它在草原与农耕文明的十字路口，书写下了属于自己的一段传奇，为后续的历史发展铺垫了基石，也让后人得以窥见那个时代风云变幻中的辉煌与梦想。

conversation.content: In the realm of philosophical inquiry, time emerges as a focal point of contention and intrigue. The notion that time constitutes an intrinsic quality of the universe, an ever-present continuum existing independently of human experience, is a deeply ingrained assumption. Yet, this assumption warrants rigorous examination. Upon closer scrutiny, time reveals its nature not as an inherent characteristic of things in themselves but rather as a spectral fabric interwoven with the subjective threads of human perception. This perspective aligns with the doctrine that time's objective validity is confined to the sphere of human experience and sensory intuition. Such a view posits that our sensory apparatus and cognitive frameworks act as lenses through which the concept of time is projected, thus conferring upon it a semblance of reality. Absent the filter of human perception, time would dissipate as an abstraction, devoid of substance and independence. It becomes evident that time, in this philosophical light, is not an autonomous entity existing in seclusion from our experiential realities. Rather, it is a construct, a subjective condition tethered inexorably to the phenomenological dimensions of human existence. Consequently, the objective existence of time is not a testament to an external, self-sustaining chronometric reality but a manifestation of our perceptual and cognitive engagements with the world. Hence, the pursuit of understanding time must continually reconcile its existence within the bounds of human sensory experiences, acknowledging the weight of perception in shaping its essence.

conversation.content:
Experience stands as a cornerstone in humanity's quest for understanding the world and informing our judgments about matters of fact. While its value is indisputable, serving as a guiding light that illuminates the paths of knowledge, we must also acknowledge its fallible nature. The realm of experience, though vast and enlightening, is not impervious to the shadows of error. To illustrate, the common expectation of June offering more pleasant climes than December, rooted firmly in past observations, may on occasion be upended by unpredictable weather anomalies. Yet, these deviations from the expected should not breed an outright distrust in the faculty of experience itself; rather, they underscore a subtle lesson within experience's own teachings.

Experience whispers to us of uncertainty through the observable fluctuations in natural phenomena, reminding us of the need for nuance in our inferences. Not all causal relationships present themselves with equal degrees of certainty; some are bound with a consistency that borders on the immutable, while others dance in the realms of variability, challenging the very predictions they seem to inform. Thus, the tapestry of our factual reasoning is woven with threads of varying tensile strength—some representing near-certainties, others mere probabilities tinged with the hues of probability and likelihood.

In this light, our intellectual journey navigates a spectrum, at one end bathed in the bright luminosity of highly certain truths, and at the other, shrouded in the dimmer, yet no less significant, light of moral evidence. Here, 'moral evidence' signifies not merely ethical concerns but a broader reliance on probabilities and reasonable expectations informed by our experiences. It is within this spectrum that the true depth and complexity of human reasoning find their expression, as we strive to reconcile the lessons of experience with the inherent unpredictability of existence. Through this balance, we come to appreciate that wisdom does not demand infallibility from experience but rather an understanding of its limits and the humility to navigate the uncertainties it reveals.

conversation.content:
Throughout the tube era, a wide array of tube bases and sockets were developed, driven by ongoing technological advancements. Early tube sockets were primarily mounted on metal chassis, providing a secure and grounded connection for the tubes. With the advent of printed circuit boards (PCBs), these sockets were adapted to accommodate the new technology, enabling more compact and efficient electronic designs.

The design of tube sockets typically featured numbered pins arranged in a clockwise manner from a designated index point. This standardized arrangement ensured consistency and ease of use across various applications. As tube technology evolved, so did the complexity and functionality of the sockets.

In the 1930s, some tubes began to feature a unique connection for the control grid located on the top of the tube. This innovation allowed for better control and manipulation of the electronic signals passing through the tube. Over time, this design evolved further to include plate connections, which permitted the use of higher voltages and improved the isolation between input and output circuits. This enhancement was crucial for reducing interference and improving the overall performance of the electronic devices.

A select few tubes were designed with both grid and plate caps, symmetrically placed on the top of the tube. This dual-cap design offered even greater flexibility and control over the electronic signals, catering to the needs of more complex and demanding electronic systems. The evolution of tube bases and sockets throughout the tube era reflects the continuous pursuit of improved performance, efficiency, and adaptability in electronic technology.

conversation.content:
Title: Advancements in Pion Physics: A Probe of Strong Interactions and the Standard Model

Abstract:

The discovery of pions in 1947 as the predicted force carriers by H. Yukawa marked a significant milestone in the understanding of strong interactions. As bound states of the lightest quarks and anti-quarks, pions adhere to Bose statistics, making them a fascinating subject for study. Recent breakthroughs in lattice gauge theory have enabled the precise determination of Standard Model parameters, including quark masses, thereby elevating pions to a critical role in testing our comprehension of strong interactions. As pseudo-Goldstone bosons, pions' high-precision properties serve as a benchmark for our understanding of the strong interaction spectrum.

Despite significant progress, challenges persist both theoretically and experimentally. The determination of the neutral pion's lifetime remains an open issue, while the development of effective field theories that accurately describe pion properties is an ongoing effort. Studies of pion-pion scattering using dispersion relations offer crucial insights for the analysis of high-precision experimental data. These findings are indispensable for estimating the Standard Model's contributions to the muon's anomalous magnetic moment, currently under investigation at Fermilab. Furthermore, they shed light on the rare isospin-violating decay of the eta meson into three pions, a phenomenon that continues to intrigue physicists. As researchers continue to tackle these challenges, advancements in pion physics will undoubtedly refine our understanding of the Standard Model and the strong interactions that govern the universe.

As the tricolor fluttered above the Castel dell'Ovo, the people of Naples rejoiced, believing the French invasion marked the dawn of a new era of liberty. conversation.content: We developed single-shot shaped pulses for ultra high fidelity (uh-fidelity) population transfer on a 3-level quantum system in lambda configuration. To ensure high fidelity, we use the lewis-riesenfeld (l-r) method to derive a family of solutions leading to an exact transfer, where the solutions follow a single dynamical mode of the l-r invariant. Among this family, we identify a tracking solution with a single parameter to control simultaneously the fidelity of the transfer, the population of the excited state, and robustness. We define a measure of the robustness of an uh-fidelity transfer as the minimum percentile deviation on the pulse areas at which the infidelity rises above $10^{-4}$. The robustness of our shaped pulses is found superior to that of gaussian and adiabatically-optimized pulses for moderate pulse areas.

创造力并非凭空而来，而是源于长期的实践和积累。如同参天巨树需要经历漫长的风雨洗礼，卓越的创造力也需要经年累月的沉淀与锤炼。

以文学创作为例，那些流传千古的诗句佳篇，无一不是作者多年心血的结晶。唐代诗人贾岛为求得一句“鸟宿池边树，僧敲月下门”的最佳表达，反复推敲，甚至在韩愈面前“推敲”半天，最终成就了千古名句。曹雪芹历经十年创作《红楼梦》，将人生百态融入字里行间。杜甫“读书破万卷，下笔如有神”，其诗歌的厚重与深刻，源于他多年对社会现实的关注和对诗歌艺术的苦心孤诣。鲁迅先生弃医从文，用笔杆子作为武器唤醒民众，他的作品是多年思考和写作的成果。

这些文学巨匠的成功并非偶然，他们看似“天成”的佳句和“偶得”的灵感，背后无不隐藏着巨大的付出和努力。由此可见，创造力的培养需要我们保持持续的热情和投入，在长期的实践中不断积累经验，打磨技艺，最终才能创造出令人惊叹的成果。

conversation.content: The nature of public deliberation and the limitations inherent to the Sovereign's authority are profound subjects of political theory. Central to this examination is the paradox that while public deliberation serves to bind individuals in the body politic to the will of the Sovereign, it cannot likewise bind the Sovereign itself. To comprehend this, we must consider that the Sovereign, in essence, represents the collective will and is thus bound by the very nature of this will. Binding the Sovereign to itself through public deliberation would be tantamount to an individual making a contract with oneself—a nonsensical proposition. Consequently, fundamental laws, including the sacrosanct social contract, do not possess the power to constrain the Sovereign. This lack of constraint does not translate into unrestricted power, however. The Sovereign, while immune to internal constraints by its very nature, may enter into external agreements, provided that these do not infringe upon the foundational tenets of the social contract itself. Critically, the Sovereign cannot partake in actions that are self-destructive, such as alienating portions of its own body or yielding to another Sovereign’s will. To do so would be an act of self-annihilation, fundamentally undermining its existence and contradicting the primary purpose of the social contract—to preserve the collective entity. Thus, the omnipotence of the Sovereign is not unbounded; it is framed by the imperative of self-preservation and fidelity to the social contract.

The model was launched in 1931, the same year as the Tatra 80, and the two models have the same backbone chassis and swing axle suspension. The front wheels have a rigid axle with overhead transverse leaf springs. The rear wheels are on a swing axle with half transverse leaf springs. The Type 70 has disc wheels, whereas the Type 80 has wire wheels.
But the underlying difference is the engine. The Type 80 was given a 5,990 cc, 65-degree V-12 sidevalve engine,[1] but the Type 70 has a water-cooled six-cylinder OHC 3,406 cc engine that produces 65 hp (48 kW). The engine camshaft is driven by a bevel. Transmission is via a multi-plate dry clutch and four-speed gearbox to the rear wheels. The car weighs about 2,400 kg (5,300 lb) and its top speed is 110 km/h (68 mph).
The model was offered with a choice of bodies that included a four-seat sedan, two-door coupé, four-door convertible and six-seat limousine. A fire engine version was also built. Total production was 50 cars by 27 April 1932.

conversation.content:
厚葬久丧，是一个自古以来备受争议的问题。一方面，厚葬久丧被认为是一种对逝者的尊敬和缅怀，表达了对尊严的高度重视，体现了孝道与家庭观念。而另一方面，厚葬久丧可能给社会带来一系列负面影响，包括经济上的压力和人力资源的浪费，以及引发社会不公问题。例如，贫困家庭为了遵循这种传统，不惜耗尽家财，甚至负债累累；富裕家庭则厚葬巨资，导致贫富差距更加明显，进而影响社会稳定和和谐。因此，在讨论厚葬久丧是否符合仁义时，关键在于考量其实际效果。

如果厚葬久丧能够有效解决贫富差距、人口多寡、社会安全，以及社会治理混乱等问题，那么它就是仁义之举，值得推行。然而，这种做法一旦产生负面效果，例如加剧社会不公、引发社会矛盾以及给国家和百姓带来实际困扰，那么这种做法显然不符合仁义，必须予以阻止。

在施政过程中，关键应以天下之利为准则。任何政策的制定和推行，都必须以是否利国利民为最终衡量标准。厚葬久丧如果带来了负面影响，则应采取措施加以遏制，避免给国家和百姓带来不必要的困扰和损害。相反，如果经实际考量发现其能够促进社会的和谐和稳定，则可以根据实际情况有所推行。因此，施政应以利天下为目标，不应给国家和百姓带来害处。这种以实际效果为导向的思考方式，才真正符合仁义精神和施政原则。

conversation.content: We developed single-shot shaped pulses for ultra high fidelity (uh-fidelity) population transfer on a 3-level quantum system in lambda configuration. To ensure high fidelity, we use the lewis-riesenfeld (l-r) method to derive a family of solutions leading to an exact transfer, where the solutions follow a single dynamical mode of the l-r invariant. Among this family, we identify a tracking solution with a single parameter to control simultaneously the fidelity of the transfer, the population of the excited state, and robustness. We define a measure of the robustness of an uh-fidelity transfer as the minimum percentile deviation on the pulse areas at which the infidelity rises above $10^{-4}$. The robustness of our shaped pulses is found superior to that of gaussian and adiabatically-optimized pulses for moderate pulse areas.

conversation.content: In the 1950s, the discovery of two new drugs sparked what would become a multibillion dollar market for antidepressants. Neither drug was intended to treat depression at all— in fact, at the time, many doctors and scientists believed psychotherapy was the only approach to treating depression. The decades-long journey of discovery that followed revolutionized our understanding of depression— and raised questions we hadn’t considered before.One of those first two antidepressant drugs was ipronaizid, which was intended to treat tuberculosis. In a 1952 trial, it not only treated tuberculosis, it also improved the moods of patients who had previously been diagnosed with depression. In 1956, a Swiss clinician observed a similar effect when running a trial for imipramine, a drug for allergic reactions. Both drugs affected a class of neurotransmitters called monoamines.The discovery of these antidepressant drugs gave rise to the chemical imbalance theory, the idea that depression is caused by having insufficient monoamines in the brain’s synapses. Ipronaizid, imipramine, and other drugs like them were thought to restore that balance by increasing the availability of monoamines in the brain.These drugs targeted several different monoamines, each of which acted on a wide range of receptors in the brain. This often meant a lot of side effects, including headaches, grogginess, and cognitive impairments including difficulty with memory, thinking, and judgment.Hoping to make the drugs more targeted and reduce side effects, scientists began studying existing antidepressants to figure out which specific monoamines were most associated with improvements in depression. In the 1970s, several different researchers converged on an answer: the most effective antidepressants all seemed to act on one monoamine called serotonin.This discovery led to the production of fluoxetine, or Prozac, in 1988.

conversation.content: Pions were predicted by H. Yukawa as force carriers of the inter-nucleon forces, and were detected in 1947. Today they are known to be bound states of quarks and anti-quarks of the two lightest flavours. They satisfy Bose statistics, and are the lightest particles of the strong interaction spectrum. Determination of the parameters of the Standard Model, including the masses of the lightest quarks, has only recently reached high precision on the lattice. Pions are also known to be pseudo-Goldstone bosons of spontaneously broken approximate axial-vector symmetries, and a probe of their properties and interactions at high precision tests our knowledge of the strong interactions. While also being a probe of the solution of the strong interactions on the computer, which is known as lattice gauge theory. Despite their long history, there are significant experimental and theoretical challenges in determining their properties at high precision. Examples include the lifetime of the neutral pion, and the status of their masses and decay widths in effective field theories. Pion-pion scattering has been studied for several decades using general methods of field theory such as dispersion relations based on analyticity, unitarity and crossing. Knowledge from these theoretical methods are used to confront high precision experimental data, and to analyze them to extract information on their scattering and phase shift parameters. This knowledge is crucial for estimating the Standard Model contributions to the anomalous magnetic moment of the muon, which is being probed at Fermilab in ongoing experiments. Other sensitive tests include the rare decay of the eta meson into three pions, which represents an isospin violating decay. The present article briefly reviews these important developments.

索拉语是一种属于印度蒙达语族的语言，母语使用者主要集中在印度东南部的奥里萨邦及其相邻地区。此外，在其他邦的少量社区中也存在使用索拉语的现象。这种语言的书写系统主要有三种：拉丁字母、泰卢固文，以及在1936年为索拉语言专门设计的索拉僧平文字。

索拉语的音系含有18个辅音和8个元音。需要注意的是，尽管索拉语中存在不同的韵母长度，但它们在索拉语中并不作为不同的音素存在，这意味不同长度的韵母不会改变词义。

Juray语被认为是索拉语的一种方言，这种方言在某些特征和用法上存在一定的差异。索拉语也被提及在2008年的美国纪录片《语言学家》中，这部纪录片介绍了世界各地濒危语言的现状，并探讨了保存和复兴这些语言的重要性。

索拉语的使用情况和现状在近年来得到了越来越多的关注，特别是在语言保护和文化遗产保护方面。印度政府和国际语言学界都在努力进行记录和研究，以确保这种独特的语言能够继续传承下去。对索拉语言的研究不仅有助于了解其语言结构和历史演变，还能为蒙达语族其他语言的研究提供有价值的参考。

总之，索拉语作为一种在印度特定地区广泛使用的语言，具有独特的书写系统和语音特征。在语言学研究和文化保护的背景下，索拉语的重要性不可忽视。

conversation.content:
In a historic move, Britain's largest home loan lender, Halifax Building Society, has announced its intention to convert to bank status and float on the stock market by next June. This monumental shift, valued at approximately £10 billion ($16 billion), marks a significant transformation in the UK's financial landscape.

David Gilchrist, a director at Halifax, expressed confidence in the society's ability to maintain its independence despite potential takeover attempts. "We are well-positioned to navigate the challenges that come with this transition," Gilchrist stated, underscoring the society's robust financial health and market presence.

The conversion plan, hailed as the largest extension of private share ownership in Britain, will be put to a vote by its nine million members early next year. Although the proposal does not include a five-year takeover protection clause, analysts suggest that Halifax's substantial size and track record of success could still attract bids from interested parties.

Gilchrist remains optimistic about securing the necessary 50% voting approval, citing past conversion votes that have exceeded 75%. "We have a strong track record of member support, and we are confident that our members will see the benefits of this transition," he said.

To bolster the voting process, Halifax plans to launch an extensive marketing campaign aimed at educating its members about the benefits of the conversion. This move underscores the society's commitment to transparency and member engagement as it embarks on this transformative journey.

The upcoming vote will be a pivotal moment for Halifax and its members, potentially reshaping the future of one of Britain's most prominent financial institutions. As the society prepares for this significant change, all eyes will be on the outcome of the member vote and the subsequent impact on the UK's financial market.

Sir, I will answer anything. But I beseech you,
If ’t be your pleasure, and most wise consent,
(As partly I find it is) that your fair daughter,
At this odd-even and dull watch o’ the night,
Transported with no worse nor better guard,
But with a knave of common hire, a gondolier,
To the gross clasps of a lascivious Moor:
If this be known to you, and your allowance,
We then have done you bold and saucy wrongs.
But if you know not this, my manners tell me,
We have your wrong rebuke. Do not believe
That from the sense of all civility,
I thus would play and trifle with your reverence.
Your daughter (if you have not given her leave)
I say again, hath made a gross revolt,
Tying her duty, beauty, wit, and fortunes
In an extravagant and wheeling stranger
Of here and everywhere. Straight satisfy yourself:
If she be in her chamber or your house,
Let loose on me the justice of the state
For thus deluding you.
BRABANTIO.
Strike on the tinder, ho!
Give me a taper! Call up all my people!
This accident is not unlike my dream,
Belief of it oppresses me already.
Light, I say, light!

conversation.content: If we abstract our internal intuition of ourselves and all external intuitions, possible only by virtue of this internal intuition and presented to us by our faculty of representation, and consequently take objects as they are in themselves, then time is nothing. It is only of objective validity in regard to phenomena, because these are things which we regard as objects of our senses. It no longer objective we, make abstraction of the sensuousness of our intuition, in other words, of that mode of representation which is peculiar to us, and speak of things in general. Time is therefore merely a subjective condition of our (human) intuition (which is always sensuous, that is, so far as we are affected by objects), and in itself, independently of the mind or subject, is nothing. Nevertheless, in respect of all phenomena, consequently of all things which come within the sphere of our experience, it is necessarily objective. We cannot say, “All things are in time,” because in this conception of things in general, we abstract and make no mention of any sort of intuition of things. But this is the proper condition under which time belongs to our representation of objects. If we add the condition to the conception, and say, “All things, as phenomena, that is, objects of sensuous intuition, are in time,” then the proposition has its sound objective validity and universality à priori.

conversation.content: This paper investigates the population negative log-likelihood function of Gaussian mixture models (GMMs) irrespective of the number of components. Given the nonconvex nature of the problem, multiple local minima exist that are not globally optimal, even for well-separated mixtures. The authors demonstrate that every local minimum possesses a structure that partially identifies the true components, either by fitting multiple Gaussians to a single component or by fitting a single Gaussian to multiple components. These findings are particularly relevant when the true components meet certain separation criteria and hold for both over-specified and under-specified component numbers. For GMMs with three components, the results provide more precise insights into the scaling related to component separation. The paper offers a significant contribution to the understanding of the landscape of the negative log-likelihood function in GMMs and has implications for the development of more effective initialization and optimization strategies.

conversation.content:
君子与小人之别，在于其心之所向，行之所指。君子以善为师，以过为戒，闻过则喜，见贤思齐。他们视批评为磨砺自身的良药，视指正者为人生的益友。他们亲近正直之人，以求共同精进，厌恶谄媚之徒，以防堕入虚伪之境。君子追求善良，乐于接受劝谏，不断反思，不断进步，最终修身齐家治国平天下。

而小人则背道而驰，以恶为荣，以过为傲。他们沉溺于虚假的赞美，对批评充耳不闻，视指出自己错误的人为眼中钉，肉中刺。他们亲近溜须拍马之辈，沉醉于虚假的吹捧之中，疏远忠诚直言之人，将逆耳忠言视为洪水猛兽。小人追求虚荣，厌恶劝谏，固步自封，最终走向毁灭。

正如《诗经》所言：“谗人罔极，交乱四国。嗟予小子，越可忧恤。”小人喜爱谄媚，排斥善言，听从谗言，最终导致国家混乱，自身也陷入困境。这正是小人的悲哀之处：他们被虚假的赞美蒙蔽了双眼，最终走向自我毁灭的深渊。

君子与小人的区别，在于他们对待批评的态度，在于他们选择朋友的标准，更在于他们内心对善恶的追求。君子以善为本，虚怀若谷，最终成就伟业；小人以恶为荣，自欺欺人，最终走向灭亡。

conversation.content:
The pursuit of understanding causes and effects, those foundational principles that govern the dance of existence, ultimately leads us back to a contemplation of the objects themselves – their being and their attributes. Existence, in its purest form, is not an attribute bestowed upon an object, but rather an intrinsic facet of the very idea of the object itself. To believe in the existence of an object is not to layer an additional concept onto our initial conception; it is merely to embrace the totality of that conception.

Consider the concept of God, a being often ascribed with the weighty mantle of existence. To conceive of God, with all the attributes we ascribe to such an entity – omnipotence, omniscience, omnibenevolence – is, in essence, to already entertain the notion of God's existence. We add nothing new to our conception by appending the notion of "existence" to it. The difference between merely conceiving of God and believing in God's existence lies not in the constituent elements of the idea itself, but in the manner in which we hold that idea.

Conceiving of God, in this sense, is akin to holding a blueprint – a detailed plan for a magnificent structure. It lays out the design, the materials, the dimensions, yet it remains inert, a potentiality captured on paper. Belief, on the other hand, breathes life into that blueprint. It is the act of taking that detailed plan and realizing it, constructing the edifice in our minds, allowing its grandeur to take form and shape our understanding of the world. The components remain the same – the blueprint has not changed – but the manner in which we engage with it transforms our experience of it.

conversation.content:
This study introduces an innovative glucose prediction algorithm designed for the management of type 1 diabetes, integrating meal absorption and physical exercise data in addition to traditional inputs such as glucose levels, insulin dosage, and carbohydrate intake. The algorithm employs a compartmental model of glucose-insulin dynamics coupled with a deconvolution technique to enhance the accuracy of glucose forecasting. Validation was conducted using both in silico data and clinical data sourced from adults with type 1 diabetes (T1D).

Experimental results revealed that incorporating data on meal absorption and physical exercise significantly improves prediction accuracy, as evidenced by a substantial reduction in root mean square error (RMSE). Specifically, the new algorithm outperformed a validated LVX model across both datasets, showcasing superior precision in predicting glycemic events, notably hypoglycemia and hyperglycemia.

This enhanced performance underscores the importance of considering dynamic physiological factors such as nutrient absorption and physical activity in glucose prediction models. The findings suggest that by integrating these additional variables, the predictive capability of glucose monitoring systems is markedly improved, offering tremendous potential for enhancing the management of type 1 diabetes.

In conclusion, the study's novel algorithm represents a significant advancement in the field of diabetes management, providing robust and reliable glucose predictions. This improvement can facilitate more effective and proactive diabetes care, ultimately contributing to better patient outcomes and quality of life for individuals living with type 1 diabetes. Future work will focus on refining the algorithm and expanding clinical trials to further validate its efficacy and applicability across a broader demographic of T1D patients.

conversation.content:
我们都是从青涩的少年长成的，在经历了无数的考验之后，才成为了今天的我们。每次回到自己的母校，看到那熟悉的校园，看到那些活泼的孩子，往往会勾起我们的回忆。今天，我站在这里，不仅是一个前语文老师，更是一个过来人的身份，跟大家分享一下关于语文学习的那些事。

记得我还在教书的时候，每当提起文言文，学生们就开始头疼。有时觉得自己像是传说中的唐僧，“西天取经”——在“无边无际”的文言文中去寻找答案。每当这时，我也头疼，跟孩子们开玩笑说：“你看，师傅也头疼了，我们是一根绳上的蚂蚱，都不容易。”

鲁迅先生的作品是我们语文课堂上一道无法逾越的“高山”，虽然我不是一个很爱看书的人，但也看过鲁迅的很多作品，包括《狂人日记》、《阿Q正传》、《祝福》等。这些作品的语言虽然平白易懂，但有些地方仍然需要深思熟虑，细细品味，才能理解其中的深意。

在语文学习的过程中，作文也是一道难以逾越的“鸿沟”。我每次布置作文题目后，学生们的反应有两种，一种是满面春风、一种是愁眉苦脸。满面春风的大多是女生，她们的作文一般都写得很好，愁眉苦脸的多是男生，作文是他们的“老大难”。尽管如此，作文是语文学习的重要组成部分，无法回避。因此，我常常跟男同学开玩笑说：“你们要好好写，不然就得重考。”

现在，距离我退休已经快十年了，但我仍然关心着孩子们的教育问题。虽然我已经不能站在讲台上给孩子们上课，但我仍然可以利用自己的余热，通过这样那样的方式，关心他们的成长。我们每个人都是国家的未来，我们每个人都是社会的未来，只有我们共同努力，才能让我们的国家更强大。

conversation.content: 于是张良至军门见樊哙。樊哙曰：“今日之事何如？”良曰：“甚急！今者项庄拔剑舞，其意常在沛公也。”哙曰：“此迫矣！臣请入，与之同命。”哙即带剑拥盾入军门。交戟之卫士欲止不内，樊哙侧其盾以撞，卫士仆地，哙遂入，披帷西向立，瞋目视项王，头发上指，目眦尽裂。项王按剑而跽曰：“客何为者？”张良曰：“沛公之参乘樊哙者也。”项王曰：“壮士！赐之卮酒。”则与斗卮酒。哙拜谢，起，立而饮之。项王曰：“赐之彘肩。”则与一生彘肩。樊哙覆其盾于地，加彘肩上，拔剑切而啖之。项王曰：“壮士！能复饮乎？”樊哙曰：“臣死且不避，卮酒安足辞！夫秦王有虎狼之心，杀人如不能举，刑人如恐不胜，天下皆叛之。怀王与诸将约曰：‘先破秦入咸阳者王之。’今沛公先破秦入咸阳，毫毛不敢有所近，封闭宫室，还军霸上，以待大王来。故遣将守关者，备他盗出入与非常也。劳苦而功高如此，未有封侯之赏，而听细说，欲诛有功之人，此亡秦之续耳。窃为大王不取也！”项王未有以应，曰：“坐。”樊哙从良坐。坐须臾，沛公起如厕，因招樊哙出。

conversation.content:
在那遥远的上古时代，宇宙尚处于一种无边无际、混沌未分的状态，既无天地之别，亦无形影之辨。这混沌，是所有存在的源头，蕴藏着阴阳未显的至纯潜力。而后，仿佛宇宙自身的觉醒，阴阳二神从这无垠的混沌中腾跃而出，携带着创世的力量。阳神以其不竭的活力，开辟了天空的广阔；阴神则以她的深邃与包容，塑造了大地的厚重。此二者，虽性质相异，却在互动中达到了微妙的平衡，从而使得世界初具形态，万物的种子得以在这片新生的天地间萌芽。

世间万物，在阴阳二气的交织、升降、融合中孕育而生。树木拔地而起，山川湖海渐成其形，飞禽走兽遍居其间，生机勃勃。人类，作为万物之灵，其精神性格受天之启发，躯体形态则源于地之滋养，成为了天地间最为独特的存在。这一精魄与形骸的双重归属，让人类得以在物质与精神的世界中自由游走，探求生命的意义与宇宙的真理。

在此宏大的宇宙观下，古代的圣人们洞察了天地间的奥秘，他们深知宇宙的运行不离阴阳之道，万物的生灭皆遵循自然的法则。因此，圣人以天地为楷模，视天为精神之父，以其高远、光明引领内心的追求；以地为养育之母，学习其坚韧与慈爱，滋养身心。在圣人的眼中，世俗的纷扰与人欲的枷锁皆为过眼云烟，唯有顺应自然，方能达至内心的平和与自由。

于是，圣人们行走于世，不为物累，不为形役，以简朴的生活态度，实践着天人合一的理想。他们教化世人，倡导遵循天地的节律，尊重自然的秩序，倡导心灵的净化与自我超越。在这样一种哲学思想的指导下，人与自然和谐共生，社会秩序井然，展现了一幅理想中的人间画卷。由此观之，天地阴阳之理，不仅构筑了宇宙的基石，更成为了指引人类文明前行的明灯，照亮着每一个寻求真理与智慧的灵魂。

conversation.content:
《离骚》和《楚辞》是中国古代文学的两大经典之作，它们不仅在风格上有着深深的影响，而且在文学创作的历史上也占据着重要的位置。

《楚辞》是战国时期楚国的文学作品，仿效三代经典，其文辞独具奇伟瑰丽。它风格上融入了战国纵横家的风气，使得《楚辞》成为中国古代文学中的佼佼者。

《离骚》是《楚辞》中的经典之作，全诗表达了作者对理想的追求和对现实的批判。通过对《离骚》、《九章》、《九歌》、《九辩》、《远游》、《天问》、《招魂》、《大招》、《卜居》、《渔父》的具体分析，可以看出它们具有深刻的感情表达、精巧的构思和恢宏的气势。

其中，《离骚》和《九章》主要表现了作者的理想主义精神和对社会的批判；《九歌》和《九辩》则展现了作者的浪漫主义情怀；《远游》和《天问》体现了作者的探索精神；《招魂》和《大招》则展现了作者的哲理思考；《卜居》和《渔父》则表达了作者对自然的向往和对世俗的超脱。

总之，《离骚》和《楚辞》在文学史上占据着重要的位置，它们的文辞艳丽、抒情哀怨、构思精巧、气势恢宏，成就独特，是难以与其他作品媲美的经典之作。

conversation.content: Hurricane Estelle was a powerful tropical cyclone that caused minor damage and two deaths in Hawaii in July 1986. Estelle was the sixth tropical cyclone, fifth named storm, third hurricane, and first major hurricane of the above-average 1986 Pacific hurricane season. It formed as a tropical depression formed well southwest of the Baja California Peninsula on July 16, and strengthened into a tropical storm within 24 hours. Located within a favorable environment, Estelle intensified into a hurricane on July 18. It attained major hurricane status (Category 3 intensity or higher on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale) two days later. After peaking in intensity at Category 4 strength, Estelle slowly weakened. By July 24, Estelle was no longer a hurricane while passing south of Hawaii. It completely dissipated on July 26 after further deteriorating to a tropical depression. The arrival of the hurricane prompted a hurricane watch for Hawaii, and 200 people evacuated from their homes. Hurricane Estelle produced high waves offshore Hawaii, causing $2 million in damage and two deaths. The remnants of the storm also produced intermittent showers across the state, though there was no major damage.

conversation.content: We come next to relations. The easiest relations to apprehend are those which hold between the different parts of a single complex sense-datum. For example, I can see at a glance the whole of the page on which I am writing; thus the whole page is included in one sense-datum. But I perceive that some parts of the page are to the left of other parts, and some parts are above other parts. The process of abstraction in this case seems to proceed somewhat as follows: I see successively a number of sense-data in which one part is to the left of another; I perceive, as in the case of different white patches, that all these sense-data have something in common, and by abstraction I find that what they have in common is a certain relation between their parts, namely the relation which I call 'being to the left of'. In this way I become acquainted with the universal relation.

conversation.content:
Clear Blue in Stormy Skies is the sixth studio album by New Zealand singer Jenny Morris. It was released 24 June 2006, by Liberation Blue Records. It is a collection of Morris' remodelled radio hits of the 1980s and 1990s, including a retake of "You I Know", rewritten by its original songwriter, Neil Finn, an instrumental arrangement of her most requested song, "Little Little", and a cover of INXS' song, "This Time", in tribute to her friend Michael Hutchence. The one new song, "This Time", contains the album's title as a lyric.
Clear Blue in Stormy Skies was recorded in February 2006 with members of her backing band, Steve Balbi (Noiseworks, Electric Hippies) who co-produced; Paul Searles (Skunkhour) and Josh Quong Tart.
Morris' vocals were recorded on a vintage valve microphone once used by Frank Sinatra.
We also used a lot of this old spring reverb. It crapped out a lot and it was very frustrating, but man, when it worked it was amazing and I think that's why this album has got that special earthiness about it.
— Jenny Morris

conversation.content: It's graduation day at the small New England college where my dad taught. It's a burst of color and excitement. When I was little, he'd carry me up on his shoulders and I'd marvel at the pageantry. I loved the wizard-like academic robes that all the professors wore. My father explained how you could tell what degree someone had and the school they'd gone to, based on the color and design of their gown and hood. It was like a diploma, a credential that you could wear. I couldn't wait to have one of my own.My dad taught biochemistry for decades and was one of those beloved professors. Graduation, for him, was a frenzy of thankful hugs and handshakes, eager introductions to parents. Countless careers in science and medicine were launched in his Bio 101 class, and it was clear he made a difference.I suppose I inherited a love of teaching from my dad, and I planned to be a professor, just like him. I headed to grad school to do a PhD, studying microbiology and microchemistry. But along the way, my dad's path and mine started to diverge.During long days in lab, I got impatient. I wanted to teach. I didn’t want to wait to graduate and do a postdoc, spend years navigating a treacherous job market. So I turned to the internet, which was breaking down the barriers to entry and removing the traditional gatekeepers in many established fields. From my kitchen table, I started recording tutorial videos, teaching the basics of chemistry using simple, hand-drawn diagrams. I put the videos on YouTube ... and people actually started watching them. First, a few folks, and then more, and then more. Thank-you emails poured into my inbox. I wasn't a professor yet, I hadn't even finished my PhD, but I was helping students all over the world get through their chemistry classes.I got the sense that something big was brewing here. But my dad would hear none of it. When I explained that I was thinking about abandoning the traditional professorship route to explore this new world of online education, he exploded in anger. "Oh, Tyler, you'd have to be an idiot to think that anyone would care about this stupid YouTube thing." I shot back with a dig. conversation.content:
Chinese dissident Wang Dan has appealed against his 11-year jail sentence for plotting to subvert the government, but his mother said on Tuesday she held little hope of an acquittal or a lighter sentence.
Wang Lingyun said she hoped U.S. Secretary of State Warren Christopher and German President Roman Herzog would raise her son's predicament in their meetings with Chinese leaders when they visit China later this month.
"Wang Dan... should be acquitted because... he's innocent," she told Reuters by telephone. "We hope for an acquittal or a reduced sentence... but it is unlikely."
Wang Lingyun, who acted as one of two defence lawyers in her son's case, said court officials had asked her to submit a written defence for the appeal and that family members may not be allowed to attend the appeals court trial.
Experts on China's legal system have said the chances of the appeals court overturning the lower court's verdict were slim.
An official of the Beijing Higher People's Court said the 27-year-old dissident had filed his appeal. She declined to provide further details.
The Beijing Number One Intermediate People's Court took less than four hours last Wednesday to convict and sentence Wang, who had already served four years in prison for his role as a leader of the 1989 student demonstrations for democracy that were crushed by the military with heavy loss of life.
On Monday, visiting Swedish Prime Minister Goran Persson said he had expressed his disapproval to Chinese Premier Li Peng over the jailing of Wang.
A foreign ministry spokesman defended China at a news briefing on Tuesday, saying Beijing would not impose its laws on others and that foreign countries should take a similar stance.
The spokesman also said China opposed using human rights as a pretext to interfere in the internal affairs of any country.
An international human rights group denounced what it said was the "secret trial" of Wang on a trumped-up charge.
